name: A Rogue Fairytale
description:
Fairytales are not always Whimsical

A Rogue Fairytale merges the replayability of a rogue-like with the frantic action of arcade pinball. Experiance a different take of the cult classic - Snow White. Rescue your fellow dwarves and escape the darkness of the forest.

A Rogue Fairytale was made for the Mashup Jam 2018 under the theme of cult classics.

Any feedback will be greatly appreciated.

Engine used: Unity

Art: Inkscape

Animations: Spriter2D

Audio Contributions: RebCentre Moscow,  LG, Carlos Vivas
